00081                         static std::string Out

00139         template< typename T, typename U>
00140         inline void IsNotEqual
00141         ( 
00142                 const T& lhs, 
00143                 const U& rhs, 
00144                 const char* lhscode, 
00145                 const char* rhscode,
00146                 unsigned long line, 
00147                 const char* file 
00148         )
00149         {
00150                 if ( !(lhs != rhs) )
00151                 {
00152                         using namespace details;
00153                         using namespace Williams;                               
00154                         
00155 #ifdef NO_OUTPUT_OPERATOR_DETECTION
00156                         const bool isStreamable = false;
00157 #else 
00158                         const bool isStreamable = IsStreamable< T >::result && IsStreamable< U >::result;
00159 #endif                  
00160                         throw TestFailure( Print< isStreamable, IsNotEqualFunc >::template Out< T, U >
00161                                                         ( lhs, rhs, lhscode, rhscode ), line, file );
00162                 }
00163         }
